effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
